displayName.italian: Il campione di una nuova era

description.english: Obtain every achievement.
description.french: Débloquez tous les succès.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli obiettivi.
description.japanese: すべての実績を取得した
description.schinese: 取得了所有成就。
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todos los logros.

displayName.spanish: Todos para uno, y uno para todos

description.english: Recruit all units.
description.french: Recrutez toutes les unités.
description.italian: Recluta tutte le unità.
description.japanese: すべてのユニットを仲間にした
description.schinese: 所有单位都成为了同伴。
description.spanish: Has reclutado a todas las unidades.

description.english: Reach a sufficient Morality Conviction value.
description.french: Atteignez un niveau suffisant de conviction en Éthique.
description.italian: Aumenta a sufficienza la Moralità.
description.japanese: Moralの信念パラメータを十分に高めた
description.schinese: 已将道德信念值提升至足够高。
description.spanish: Has alcanzado un nivel suficiente de «Moralidad».

description.english: Reach a sufficient Utility Conviction value.
description.french: Atteignez un niveau suffisant de conviction en Pragmatisme.
description.italian: Aumenta a sufficienza il Pragmatismo.
description.japanese: Benefitの信念パラメータを十分に高めた
description.schinese: 已将功利信念值提升至足够高。
description.spanish: Has alcanzado un nivel suficiente de «Pragmatismo».

description.english: Reach a sufficient Liberty Conviction value.
description.french: Atteignez un niveau suffisant de conviction en Liberté.
description.italian: Aumenta a sufficienza la Libertà.
description.japanese: Freedomの信念パラメータを十分に高めた
description.schinese: 已将自由信念值提升至足够高。
description.spanish: Has alcanzado un nivel suficiente de «Libertad».

description.english: Reach a sufficient Morality, Utility, and Liberty Conviction value.
description.french: Atteignez un niveau suffisant de conviction en Éthique, Pragmatisme et Liberté.
description.italian: Aumenta a sufficienza tutte le convinzioni.
description.japanese: すべての信念パラメータを十分に高めた
description.schinese: 已将所有信念值提升至足够高。
description.spanish: Has alcanzado un nivel suficiente en todas las convicciones.
description.tchinese: 所有信念值達到頂峰了

description.english: Successfully persuade an ally.
description.french: Convainquez un allié.
description.italian: Effettua con successo una persuasione.
description.japanese: 説得に成功した
description.schinese: 成功说服了他人。
description.spanish: Has persuadido a otra persona.

description.english: Successfully persuade everyone to vote the same way.
description.french: Convainquez tout le monde de voter pour le même choix.
description.italian: Convinci tutti a votare per la stessa scelta.
description.japanese: 全員が同じ意見に投票した
description.schinese: 在投票时全员意见一致。
description.spanish: Has persuadido a todo el mundo para votar una misma opción.
description.tchinese: 所有人皆贊成相同意見

description.english: Cast the deciding vote when there is a tie.
description.french: Départagez les votes en cas d'égalité.
description.german: Die entscheidende Stimme in einer unentschiedenen Abstimmung abgegeben.
description.italian: Sblocca con il tuo voto una situazione di parità.
description.japanese: 票数が拮抗し、自ら行き先を決めた
description.schinese: 票数不相上下，亲自作出了决定。
description.spanish: Has depositado el voto decisivo tras un empate.
description.tchinese: 票數不分上下，自行做出決定

description.english: Do not sacrifice the town of Wolffort during chapter 7.
description.french: Ne déclenchez pas les pièges du bourg de Wolffort dans le chapitre VII.
description.german: Die Stadt Wolffort in Kapitel 7 verschont.
description.italian: Non sacrificare la città di Wolfhort nel capitolo 7.
description.japanese: 第7話でウォルホートの街を犠牲にしなかった
description.schinese: 第7话中没牺牲过沃荷德市区。
description.spanish: No has sacrificado la ciudad de Wolffort durante el capítulo 7.
description.tchinese: 第7話沒有犧牲沃荷德城鎮

description.english: Reveal Roland's identity to Svarog.
description.french: Révélez l'identité de Roland à Svarog.
description.german: Svarog die Wahrheit über Roland erzählt.
description.italian: Rivela l'identità di Roland a Svarog.
description.japanese: スヴァローグにロランの正体を明かした
description.schinese: 向施瓦洛格表明了罗兰的身份。
description.spanish: Has revelado la identidad de Roland a Svarog.
description.tchinese: 向斯瓦羅格表明羅蘭的身分

description.english: Receive the royal signet from Symon.
description.french: Recevez la chevalière royale de Simon.
description.italian: Ricevi il sigillo della famiglia reale da Simon.
description.japanese: シモンから王家の指輪を受け取った
description.schinese: 从西蒙处得到了王室戒指。
description.spanish: Has recibido el anillo real de manos de Symon.
description.tchinese: 從西蒙手中收下王室戒指

description.english: Find the key in the Rosellan village.
description.french: Découvrez la « clé » dans le village rosellien.
description.german: Den »Schlüssel« im Dorf der Rosaile entdeckt.
description.italian: Trova la chiave nel villaggio dei roseliani.
description.japanese: ローゼル族の村で『鍵』を見つけた
description.schinese: 在罗洁尔族村庄发现了“钥匙”。
description.spanish: Has descubierto la clave oculta en la aldea de los rosé.
description.tchinese: 在羅潔爾族村莊找到『關鍵』

description.english: Successfully report Sorsley's misdeeds.
description.french: Réussissez à dénoncer Sorsley.
description.german: Sorsleys Machenschaften erfolgreich zur Anklage gebracht.
description.italian: Denuncia con successo i crimini di Saltius.
description.japanese: ソルスレイの不正の告発に成功した
description.schinese: 成功告发了索斯雷伊的不法之举。
description.spanish: Has denunciado los crímenes de Sólstulo.
description.tchinese: 成功舉發索斯雷伊的走私行為

description.english: Assent to Benedict's strategy.
description.french: Suivez le plan de Benedict.
description.italian: Segui il piano di Benedict.
description.japanese: ベネディクトの策に賛同した
description.schinese: 赞同了本尼迪克的策略。
description.spanish: Has dado tu aprobación a la estrategia de Benedict.
description.tchinese: 贊同貝尼迪克特的計策

description.english: Stand with Roland's idea.
description.french: Soutenez la décision de Roland.
description.italian: Appoggia la decisione di Roland.
description.japanese: ロランの決意を支持した
description.schinese: 支持了罗兰的决意。
description.spanish: Has apoyado la decisión de Roland.

description.english: Place your faith in Frederica's ideals.
description.french: Misez sur les idéaux de Frédérica.
description.italian: Abbraccia gli ideali di Frederica.
description.japanese: フレデリカの理想に賭けた
description.schinese: 为芙蕾德丽卡的理想赌了一把。
description.spanish: Has depositado tus esperanzas en los ideales de Frederica.
description.tchinese: 將賭注押在芙德麗卡的理想

description.english: Discover the fourth path.
description.french: Découvrez la quatrième voie.
description.italian: Trova la quarta via.
description.japanese: 第四の道を見つけた
description.schinese: 找到了第四条道路。
description.spanish: Has hallado el cuarto camino.

description.english: Win a battle for the first time.
description.french: Gagnez votre première bataille.
description.italian: Vinci il tuo primo scontro.
description.japanese: 初めて戦闘に勝利した
description.schinese: 初次赢得战斗。
description.spanish: Has ganado tu primera batalla.

description.english: Win 100 battles.
description.french: Gagnez 100 batailles.
description.italian: Vinci 100 scontri.
description.japanese: 戦闘に100回勝利した
description.schinese: 赢得过100场战斗。
description.spanish: Has ganado en 100 batallas.

description.english: Exploit enemy weaknesses 100 times.
description.french: Exploitez 100 fois le point faible d'ennemis.
description.italian: Esegui 100 attacchi a un punto debole.
description.japanese: 弱点攻撃に累計100回成功した
description.schinese: 攻击弱点累计达到了100次。
description.spanish: Has aprovechado los puntos débiles de tus enemigos en 100 ocasiones.

description.english: Perform 100 follow-up attacks.
description.french: Réussissez 100 attaques en tenaille.
description.italian: Esegui 100 attacchi in sequenza.
description.japanese: 追撃を累計100回行った
description.schinese: 发动追击累计达到了100次。
description.spanish: Has ejecutado 100 ataques de persecución.

description.english: Perform 100 back attacks.
description.french: Réussissez 100 attaques par derrière.
description.italian: Esegui 100 attacchi alle spalle.
description.japanese: バックアタックを累計100回行った
description.schinese: 背后攻击累计达到了100次。
description.spanish: Has ejecutado 100 ataques por la espalda.

description.english: Set the ground ablaze 50 times.
description.french: Enflammez 50 fois le sol.
description.german: 50 Mal den Boden in Brand gesetzt.
description.italian: Incendia il suolo 50 volte.
description.japanese: 地形を累計50回燃やした
description.schinese: 制造点燃地形累计达到了50次。
description.spanish: Has prendido fuego al terreno en 50 ocasiones.

description.english: Freeze the ground 50 times.
description.french: Gelez 50 fois le sol.
description.italian: Congela il suolo 50 volte.
description.japanese: 地形を累計50回凍結させた
description.schinese: 制造冰冻地形累计达到了50次。
description.spanish: Has congelado el terreno en 50 ocasiones.

description.english: Create puddles 50 times.
description.french: Créez 50 flaques.
description.italian: Crea 50 pozzanghere.
description.japanese: 累計50回水たまりを作った
description.schinese: 制造积水地形累计达到了50次。
description.spanish: Has encharcado el terreno en 50 ocasiones.

description.english: Electrocute units 50 times.
description.french: Électrocutez 50 unités.
description.italian: Elettrifica delle unità 50 volte.
description.japanese: ユニットを累計50回感電させた
description.schinese: 让单位触电累计达到了50次。
description.spanish: Has electrocutado a otras unidades en 50 ocasiones.

description.english: Deal collision damage 50 times.
description.french: Infligez 50 fois des dégâts de collision.
description.italian: Infliggi danni da collisione 50 volte.
description.japanese: 衝突ダメージを累計50回与えた
description.schinese: 造成碰撞伤害累计达到了50次。
description.spanish: Has provocado daño en impacto en 50 ocasiones.

description.english: Deal fall damage 50 times.
description.french: Infliger 50 fois des dégâts de chute.
description.italian: Infliggi danni da caduta 50 volte.
description.japanese: 落下ダメージを累計50回与えた
description.schinese: 造成坠落伤害累计达到了50次。
description.spanish: Has provocado daño en caída en 50 ocasiones.

description.english: Counter 50 times.
description.french: Contrez 50 fois.
description.italian: Esegui 50 contrattacchi.
description.japanese: カウンターを累計50回行った
description.schinese: 发动反击累计达到了50次。
description.spanish: Has contraatacado en 50 ocasiones.

description.english: Heal 100 times.
description.french: Soignez 100 fois.
description.italian: Cura 100 volte.
description.japanese: 回復行動を累計100回行った
description.schinese: 进行恢复行动累计达到了100次。
description.spanish: Has curado a alguien en 100 ocasiones.

description.english: Perform 100 support actions to give allies an advantage.
description.french: Utilisez 100 compétences de soutien sur vos alliés.
description.german: 100 Mal Gefährten mit unterstützenden Aktionen einen Vorteil verschafft.
description.italian: Usa azioni di supporto che avvantaggiano gli alleati 100 volte.
description.japanese: 味方を有利にするサポート行動を累計100回行った
description.koreana: 아군에게 유리한 보조 행동을 총 100회 실행했다
description.schinese: 采取对我方有利的支援行动累计达到了100次。
description.spanish: Has usado habilidades para apoyar a tus unidades aliadas en 100 ocasiones.
description.tchinese: 累計進行100次有利我方的支援行動

description.english: Perform 100 support actions to put enemies at a disadvantage.
description.french: Infligez 100 altérations d'état néfastes à vos ennemis.
description.german: 100 Mal Gegnern mit unterstützenden Aktionen einen Nachteil bereitet.
description.italian: Usa azioni di supporto che sfavoriscono i nemici 100 volte.
description.japanese: 敵を不利にするサポート行動を累計100回行った
description.koreana: 적에게 불리한 보조 행동을 총 100회 실행했다
description.schinese: 采取对敌方不利的支援行动累计达到了100次。
description.spanish: Has usado habilidades para perjudicar a las unidades enemigas en 100 ocasiones.
description.tchinese: 累計進行100次不利敵方的支援行動

description.english: Use items 100 times.
description.french: Utilisez 100 objets.
description.italian: Usa 100 oggetti.
description.japanese: アイテムを累計100個使用した
description.schinese: 使用道具累计达到了100个。
description.spanish: Has utilizado objetos en 100 ocasiones.

displayName.japanese: まとめてかかってこい

description.english: Defeat 5 or more units at one time.
description.french: Terrassez 5 ennemis (ou plus) simultanément.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 5 nemici o più contemporaneamente.
description.japanese: 5体以上同時に倒した
description.schinese: 同时击败至少5个单位。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a 5 o más unidades enemigas al mismo tiempo.

description.english: Embark with half or less than the maximum units and claim victory.
description.french: Gagnez une bataille avec la moitié (ou moins) du maximum d'unités déployables.
description.german: Einen Kampf mit weniger als der Hälfte der aufstellbaren Einheiten gewonnen.
description.italian: Scendi in campo con la metà o meno delle unità massime e vinci lo scontro.
description.japanese: 最大出撃人数の半数以下で出陣し、勝利した
description.koreana: 최대 출격 인원 수의 반으로 출진해 승리했다
description.schinese: 出击人数不超过最大出击人数的一半，并赢得了胜利。
description.spanish: Has librado una batalla con la mitad (o menos) del límite de unidades aliadas y has vencido.
description.tchinese: 以最大出擊人數一半以下的人數出征並獲勝

description.english: Deal damage with a mine cart.
description.french: Infligez des dégâts avec le chariot.
description.italian: Infliggi danni con un carrello minerario.
description.japanese: トロッコでダメージを与えた
description.schinese: 利用矿车造成了伤害。
description.spanish: Has provocado daño con una vagoneta.

description.english: Pick up 100 spoils.
description.french: Ramassez 100 butins.
description.italian: Raccogli 100 spoglie di guerra.
description.japanese: 戦利品を累計100個拾った
description.schinese: 拾取战利品累计达到了100个。
description.spanish: Has recogido 100 botines de guerra.

description.english: Use quietuses 50 times.
description.french: Utilisez 50 atouts.
description.italian: Usa le Carte vincenti 50 volte.
description.japanese: 切り札を累計50回使用した
description.schinese: 使用绝技累计达到了50次。
description.spanish: Has utilizado astucias en 50 ocasiones.

displayName.japanese: スタイリッシュバトラー

description.english: Accumulate 1,000 kudos.
description.french: Accumulez 1 000 points de hauts-faits.
description.italian: Ottieni 1000 Punti Encomio.
description.japanese: 累積戦巧ポイント1000を達成した
description.schinese: 获得战巧点数累计达到了1000。
description.spanish: Has acumulado 1000 puntos de valentía.

description.english: Accumulate 1,000,000 coins.
description.french: Accumulez 1 000 000 d'argent.
description.italian: Accumula 1.000.000 di monete.
description.japanese: 所持金の累計獲得額が1000000になった
description.schinese: 累计获得金钱达到了1000000。
description.spanish: Has acumulado fondos por valor de 1 000 000.

description.english: Complete the mental mock battle "The Assassins."
description.french: Complétez la simulation de combat « Cent cibles à abattre ».
description.italian: Completa la battaglia immaginaria "Sterminatori di cento nemici".
description.japanese: 想定バトル「百人の刺客」をクリアした
description.schinese: 赢得了战斗推演“百人刺客”。
description.spanish: Has completado la maniobra de combate «Los cien asesinos».
description.tchinese: 完成假想戰鬥「百人刺客」

description.english: Complete all mental mock battles.
description.french: Complétez toutes les simulations de combat.
description.italian: Completa tutte le battaglie immaginarie.
description.japanese: すべての想定バトルをクリアした
description.schinese: 赢得了所有战斗推演。
description.spanish: Has completado todas las maniobras de combate.

description.english: Speak to all cats.
description.french: Parlez à tous les chats.
description.italian: Parla con tutti i gatti.
description.japanese: 全ての猫に話しかけた
description.schinese: 与所有猫都对话过。
description.spanish: Has tenido una conversación jovial con todos los gatos.

description.english: Learn all quietuses and obtain the maximum amount of Quietus Points.
description.french: Apprenez tous les atouts et obtenez le maximum de points d'atout.
description.german: Alle Trümpfe gelernt und die maximale Anzahl an Trumpfpunkten erhalten.
description.italian: Apprendi tutte le Carte vincenti e porta al massimo i Punti Carte vincenti.
description.japanese: すべての切札を覚え、切札ポイントをMAXにした
description.koreana: 모든 비장의 카드를 습득해 비장의 카드 포인트가 최대치가 되었다
description.schinese: 学会所有绝技，绝技点数达到了上限。
description.spanish: Has aprendido todas las astucias y obtenido la cantidad máxima de puntos de astucia.
description.tchinese: 習得所有絕技，絕技點數達到MAX

description.english: Travel all paths.
description.french: Complétez tous les récapitulatifs.
description.italian: Completa "Il tuo cammino".
description.japanese: 足跡をコンプリートした
description.schinese: 记录了所有历程。
description.spanish: Has recorrido todos los caminos en tu periplo.

description.english: Collect all notes.
description.french: Collectionnez tous les cahiers.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli Scritti.
description.japanese: すべての手記を集めた
description.schinese: 收集了所有札记。
description.spanish: Has reunido todos los documentos del vademécum.

description.english: Gather all information.
description.french: Rassemblez toutes les informations.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le Informazioni.
description.japanese: すべての情報を集めた
description.schinese: 收集了所有情报。
description.spanish: Has recabado toda la información posible.

description.english: Learn the Weapon Skill of all units.
description.french: Apprenez les compétences de toutes les unités.
description.italian: Ottieni le tecniche d'arma di tutte le unità.
description.japanese: 全ユニットの武器奥義を取得した
description.schinese: 取得了所有单位的武器奥义。
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todas las técnicas de arma de todas las unidades.
description.tchinese: 取得所有單位的武器奧義

description.english: Reach the pinnacle of Serenoa's strength.
description.french: Entraînez Serenor jusqu'à l'apogée de sa force.
description.italian: Porta Serenoa al massimo della forza.
description.japanese: セレノアを最強にした
description.schinese: 将瑟雷诺亚培养至最强。
description.spanish: Has mejorado las facultades de Serinoa a su punto álgido.

description.english: Reach the pinnacle of Roland's strength.
description.french: Entraînez Roland jusqu'à l'apogée de sa force.
description.italian: Porta Roland al massimo della forza.
description.japanese: ロランを最強にした
description.schinese: 将罗兰培养至最强。
description.spanish: Has mejorado las facultades de Roland a su punto álgido.

displayName.japanese: ストラテジーマスター

description.english: Reach the pinnacle of Benedict's strength.
description.french: Entraînez Benedict jusqu'à l'apogée de sa force.
description.italian: Porta Benedict al massimo della forza.
description.japanese: ベネディクトを最強にした
description.schinese: 将本尼迪克培养至最强。
description.spanish: Has mejorado las facultades de Benedict a su punto álgido.

description.english: Reach the pinnacle of Frederica's strength.
description.french: Entraînez Frédérica jusqu'à l'apogée de sa force.
description.italian: Porta Frederica al massimo della forza.
description.japanese: フレデリカを最強にした
description.schinese: 将芙蕾德丽卡培养至最强。
description.spanish: Has mejorado las facultades de Frederica a su punto álgido.

description.english: Reach the pinnacle of Geela's strength.
description.french: Entraînez Geela jusqu'à l'apogée de sa force.
description.italian: Porta Geela al massimo della forza.
description.japanese: ジーラを最強にした
description.schinese: 将吉拉培养至最强。
description.spanish: Has mejorado las facultades de Yeela a su punto álgido.

description.english: Reach the pinnacle of Anna's strength.
description.french: Entraînez Anna jusqu'à l'apogée de sa force.
description.italian: Porta Anna al massimo della forza.
description.japanese: アンナを最強にした
description.schinese: 将安娜培养至最强。
description.spanish: Has mejorado las facultades de Anna a su punto álgido.

description.english: Reach the pinnacle of Hughette's strength.
description.french: Entraînez Hughette jusqu'à l'apogée de sa force.
description.italian: Porta Hughette al massimo della forza.
description.japanese: ヒューエットを最強にした
description.schinese: 将修艾特培养至最强。
